brand.name: Beginning Boutique
brand.ethicalInfo1: Beginning Boutique is a womenswear brand that offers the latest styles and trends.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
Beginning Boutique's environment rating is 'not good enough'. It uses few eco-friendly materials. There is no evidence it has set a greenhouse gas emissions reduction target. There is no evidence it has taken meaningful action to reduce or eliminate hazardous chemicals. There is no evidence it implements water reduction initiatives.

Its labour rating is 'very poor'. It does not publish sufficient relevant information about its labour policies to give a higher rating. As a shopper you have the right to know how its products impact on its workers.

Its animal rating is 'it's a start'. There is no evidence it has a policy to minimise the suffering of animals. It uses wool. It does not use leather, down, exotic animal hair, angora, fur or exotic animal skin. There is no evidence it traces any animal product to the first stage of production.

Beginning Boutique is rated 'We avoid' overall.
brand.positiveText: Dear Beginning Boutique, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear Beginning Boutique, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.

journalArticles.title: How Ethical Are the Most Popular TikTok Clothing Brands? We Rated 27 to Find Out
